title: [CLIENT] Rek'sai not searchable by her title in the store
body: Unlike other champions, Rek'sai the Void Burrower does not show up in the store when searching for her by her title "the Void Burrower" or any substring thereof ("Void", "Burrower", etc.)

replies.body:
Hey Nine Ravens,

Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and see what's going on here. ^-^
